original_text:
Book of Santa
La slot Book of Santa è una nuova slot di Endorphina, che vuole scaldare i cuori dei giocatori con un bel tema natalizio. E bisogna dire che ci riesce benissimo, collocando la griglia dei simboli su un camino acceso, con tanto di scintille che si librano nell’aria verso la cappa.
Prodotta da Endorphina, un nuovo provider ma con tante potenzialità, la slot Book of Santa presenta 10 linee di pagamento dislocate su un display dal classico formato 3×5. Come vedremo in questa recensione, presenta interessanti simboli speciali scatter e jolly contemporaneamente, oltre che la possibilità di vincere giri gratis.
Grafica della slot machine
Graficamente, la slot Book of Santa si presente molto piacevole, con un display bello grande e i simboli che sembrano davvero illuminati e scaldati dal fuoco, per quanto sono ben riprodotti.
A rendere il tutto ancora più piacevole è la musica, con gli strumenti e i suoni tipici delle canzoncine natalizie. Insomma, l’atmosfera è servita davvero molto bene.
I simboli della slot Book of Santa comprendono l’immancabile Babbo natale, la sua slitta, stelle, campanelle e il protagonista del gioco: il libro di Babbo Natale (Book of Santa). Si tratta del libro con tutti gli indirizzi a cui recapitare i regali. Ci sarà anche il vostro?
Le funzioni e i bonus della slot Book of Santa
La slot Book of Santa presenta un solo simbolo speciale, ma molto interessante, che riesce ad attivare anche i giri gratis, l’unica funzione speciale del gioco.
Ed è proprio il libro di Babbo Natale, il simbolo speciale di Book of Santa. Questo simbolo è al tempo stesso sia scatter che jolly. Quindi, oltre sostituire tutti gli altri simboli del gioco per la creazione delle combinazioni vincenti, paga anche ogni volta che esce in 3 o più punti in uno stesso giro.
Visualizzando 3 o più simboli del libro in uno stesso giro, si attivano 10 giri gratis con uno speciale simbolo espandibile. All’inizio dei giri gratis infatti viene selezionato un simbolo in modo casuale, che avrà la capacità di espandersi sull’intero rullo in cui appare. Durante i giri gratis si possono vincere altri giri gratis.
Alla fine di ciascun giro vincente si può attivare la funzione “Gamble” per raddoppiare le vincite fino a 10 volte, con il gioco della carta più alta. Sul display vengono mostrate quattro carte e se quella selezionata è più alta di quella del dealer, si raddoppia. Il payout medio per questa funzione è dell’84%.
Valutazione della slot Book of Santa
La slot Book of Santa mi ha fatto un’ottima impressione, soprattutto per l’atmosfera che i produttori sono riusciti a ricreare. Giocarci è davvero molto piacevole e la musica (con un po’ di vento di sottofondo) offre quel tocco in più (e se non piace, si può sempre disattivare).
A livello di gioco, il payout è molto interessante e il simbolo jolly & scatter offre belle soddisfazioni, soprattutto durante i giri gratis, con l’accompagnamento dei simboli espandibili che di fatto possono offrire combinazioni vincenti in modo molto più semplice.
Il payout medio teorico della slot Book of Santa è del 96%, quindi piuttosto alto. La puntata minima è di 0,01€, la massima di 100€ per giro.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Santa is a slot game produced by Endorphina, designed to warm the hearts of players with its beautiful Christmas theme. And it must be said that it succeeds very well, with the symbol grid placed on a lit fireplace, complete with sparks floating in the air towards the mantle.
With 10 paylines on a classic 3x5 display, this slot game from a new provider with great potential features interesting special scatter and wild symbols, as well as the chance to win free spins.
Graphically, the Book of Santa slot is very pleasant, with a large display and symbols that seem to be truly illuminated and warmed by the fire. The music, with typical Christmas sounds and instruments, makes the atmosphere even more enjoyable.
The symbols in the Book of Santa slot include the inevitable Santa Claus, his sleigh, stars, bells, and the game's protagonist: Santa's book (Book of Santa). This book contains all the addresses where gifts are to be delivered. Maybe yours is in there too?
The Book of Santa slot features a single special symbol that is very interesting and also activates the free spins feature - the only special feature of the game. This special symbol is Santa's book, which is both a scatter and a wild symbol. In addition to substituting for all other symbols in the game to create winning combinations, it also pays out every time it appears in 3 or more points in a single spin.
By displaying 3 or more book symbols in a single spin, 10 free spins with a special expandable symbol are activated. At the beginning of the free spins, a symbol is randomly selected, which has the ability to expand across the entire reel where it appears. Additional free spins can be won during the feature.
At the end of each winning spin, the "Gamble" feature can be activated to double the winnings up to 10 times, with a high card game. Four cards are displayed on the screen, and if the player's selected card is higher than the dealer's card, the winnings are doubled. The average payout for this feature is 84%.
Overall, the Book of Santa slot makes a great impression, especially for the atmosphere that the producers have managed to recreate. Playing it is very enjoyable, and the music (with some background wind) offers that extra touch (and if it's not liked, it can always be turned off). In terms of gameplay, the payouts are very interesting, and the wild & scatter symbol offers great satisfactions, especially during free spins, accompanied by the expandable symbols that can offer winning combinations in a much simpler way. The theoretical average payout for the Book of Santa slot is 96%, which is rather high. The minimum bet is €0.01 and the maximum is €100 per spin.

Book of Santa – An Exciting Christmas-Themed Slot Game that Will Warm Your Heart!

Endorphina, a new provider with lots of potential, has released a new slot game that will warm the hearts of every gambler out there with its beautiful Christmas theme. The game features a symbol grid that is set on a lit fireplace with sparkling embers flying around the chimney. 

With 10 paylines situated on a classic 3x5 format, Book of Santa presents interesting special scatter and wild symbols all at once, along with the chance to win free spins. The graphics are stunning, with a beautiful and large display of illuminated and heated symbols that mimic the look of fire. The background music is also in line with the Christmas theme, consisting of instruments typical of Christmas carols. The atmosphere in the game has been truly captured and created in the best way possible. 

The symbols in the game include Santa Claus, his sleigh, stars, bells, and the game's main protagonist – Santa's book (Book of Santa). This book contains every address where gifts should be sent. Will your address be there too?

Book of Santa has only one special but exciting symbol that activates the free spins – Santa's book. This symbol is both a scatter and a wild and replaces all other symbols in the game for creating winning combinations. It also pays whenever it appears in groups of three or more in a single game. 

Viewing three or more book symbols triggers ten free spins with a special expanding symbol. During the spins, a random symbol is selected, and every time it appears, it expands to the entire reel, increasing the chances of getting winning combinations. Additional free spins can still be won during the game. Every win triggers the 'Gamble' feature which allows for doubling of winnings up to ten times by selecting the card with the highest value. 

Overall, Book of Santa is an excellent slot game, especially due to the remarkable atmosphere that the producers recreated. Playing it is enjoyable, and the background music adds that extra touch of holiday spirit. The payout percentage is also interesting, particularly during the free spins feature, which can lead to many additional winning combinations. The theoretical payout percentage is 96%. The minimum bet is €0.01, and the maximum bet is €100 per spin. Try playing Book of Santa today and experience the true spirit of Christmas while winning big!

It has 10 paylines with a classic 3x5 display. The game features interesting special scatter and wild symbols, as well as the chance to win free spins. Special symbols in Book of Santa

The symbols in Book of Santa include the inevitable Santa Claus, his sleigh, stars, bells, and the game's protagonist: Santa's book (Book of Santa). This book contains all the addresses where gifts are to be delivered. The game features a single special symbol that is both a scatter and a wild symbol. Free spins in Book of Santa

By displaying 3 or more book symbols in a single spin, 10 free spins with a special expandable symbol are activated. Gamble feature in Book of Santa
